website_summaries.verdict: The best budget-friendly fork designed for common 26-inch  mountain biking tires.
pros: Smaller 80-millimeter travel option is great for younger mountain bike riders
Head tube is easy to cut down to size for most bikes
Lightweight due to the aluminum construction
cons: 80-millimeter travel distance does not smooth out rougher rides and trails as well as larger forks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for intermediate trails
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Raleigh talus 5 to replace the spinner forks it came with, and they are a big improvement. For the price, I don't think you can get a better fork. They are on the heavy side, but function very well. I've been hitting good sized drops and jumps found on my local trail and never felt it bottom out, and they still soak up small bumps and give a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fork for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fork to replace the old SR Suntour XCM fork on my Diamondback mountain bike with the new XCT and I love the minor differences. I really enjoy the lockout and easy preload adjustment. It is a great fork for the price, while keeping in mind it's not made for downhill or other extreme riding. It is an entry level fork.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K Review

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fork for the money. The only down side is that it is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: The Ad for the SR SUNTOUR Disc Fork XCT 26 ...
customer_reviews.text: The Ad for the SR SUNTOUR Disc Fork XCT 26 says 100mm travel but manufacturer document say 80mm But it is everything I needed
customer_reviews.author: North Coast Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Good value for my GenZe electric bike
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not getting the 80mm instead of the 100mm, it rides a little high but it works. It is very heavy compared to my Fox on my Trek EX Fuel 8, overall quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy fit, cut the stem down and Ive had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E

customer_reviews.title: Good fork for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic coil fork but the controls feel really cheap. I guess that’s why I got it really cheap. 👀 It is exactly what I need for this bike though since the bike’s geometry is designed for a rigid fork. I now have a 27.5 x 2.1 rim/tire on the new XCT 26” fork. So there - question answered.
customer_reviews.author: ronaldo crespin

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: Built a cheap city mtb. Quality fork for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for a department store mountain bike.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that you have a full headset. Great value. Super upgrade for a cheap bike. Great gift for the kid that rides the wheels of their mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sail Pop

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price I was a bit surprise of the quality metal 🤘 I have seen and tried other forks with prices over 1 hundred and even 2 hundred dollars and this fork hold its own great job guys and great product and price .
customer_reviews.author: Kage

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok better than what i have but any thing was better. Bottoms out
customer_reviews.author: dathouse

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job, and some
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my Kids 26" MTB , had to trim the stem, other than that fits like a champ and takes a good pounding. Quality fork for 70 bucks
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad fork for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad fork for the price. Definatly a up grade from the old xct shocks. Rides nice. More for mild x/c.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie and her Marine

customer_reviews.title: Suntour forks
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price, I have it on a gas bike and it performs, on road, very well. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but a great option for a light duty bike
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but a great option for a light duty bike...the lockout option is great. Happy w this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Decent and cheap, managed to squeeze a 27.5 in it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Fork
customer_reviews.text: Using with a cheap bike thats been converted to an eBike using a BBS02. Smooth travel and great control. Lockout seems to work well as does the preload adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Shane D.

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a nice fork.Easy to tune.
customer_reviews.author: biorock

customer_reviews.title: Great suspension forks
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my stock forks, I bought a target mountain bike but I'm upgrading it to it's limits, these helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for average mountain bikers
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced fork for the money, a little heavy but not noticeable, definite upgrade from my old sr suntour fork. Great for average mountain bikers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have these on a motorized bike with a 49cc engine and they definitely do the trick on surface roads. Very comfortable ride and my wrists have not complained one bit. And at the price you can't go wrong. If you are a downhill MTB guy then these are probably not for you but for the surface street rider they work awesome.
customer_reviews.author: fliphouse

customer_reviews.title: Retrofit for an older bike
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed to retrofit a bike for commuter purposes. Shipped out pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Bear in mind it is just a low end fork but you cant beat it for the money
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced busted shock on gt mountain bike, did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok fork for the price. Very heavy as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it made loud springy clicky noise when compressed. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steerer tube was a little to long
customer_reviews.text: It is a good fork for the money but the steerer tube was too long, so I had to saw some of it off.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty low end forks but hey the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty low end forks but hey the job done. Best for easy commuting and maybe some very light downhill action. Has a warning label against jumping so wouldn't recommend that. Otherwise good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is probably a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this as I purchased the wrong size fork. But, this is probably a great product.
customer_reviews.author: WR

product_meta.title: SR SUNTOUR Mountain Bike Disc Fork XCT
product_meta.description:
SunTour or SR Suntour is a manufacturer of bicycle components. It was Japanese-owned and managed, based in Osaka, until the mid-1990s when its name was sold to a Taiwan conglomerate. Its products ranged from suspension forks to derailleurs.
Damping: Mechanical Lock out
Spring: Coil Spring
Travel: 100mm
Axle: 9mm
Brake: Disc Brake Only
Lower: Aluminum
Stanchion tube: STKM
Steerer tube: 1-1/8" = 28.6mm
Color: Gloss Black
Weight: 2.58kg = 5.7lbs
Made in Taiwan
Warranty: One year
